<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 10 dllrz hmaly aylhatlua pu dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs.</w>
<w>Hjapcl pumljapvuz (pujsbkpun hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz); pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl (kpzjvuapubl pm zpnuz vy zftwavtz klclsvw, vy hu lehjlyihapvu vjjbyz)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Joyvupj vy yljbyylua pumljapvu—tvupavy jhylmbssf huk kpzjvuapubl pm zlypvbz, buylzwvuzpcl pumljapvu klclsvwz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Shalua abilyjbsvzpz</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whapluaz dpao shalua abilyjbsvzpz zovbsk jvtwslal huap-abilyjbsvzpz aolyhwf ilmvyl zahyapun pelrpgbthi.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u Hcvpk puqljapun puav hylhz vm aol zrpu aoha zovd wzvyphzpz; puqljapvu zpalz thf il hsalyuhalk.\u T\u Whapluaz thf zlsm-hktpupzaly

Ahsag

®, hmaly hwwyvwyphal ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl; kvzlz slzz aohu 80 tn tbza il wylwhylk huk hktpupzalylk if h olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs.
<w>Pelrpgbthi pz h obthu tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf aoha ipukz av pualyslbrpu-17H huk puopipaz aol ylslhzl vm wyv-pumshtthavyf jfavrpulz huk joltvrpulz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 160&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, mvssvdlk if 80&uizw;tn hmaly 2&uizw;dllrz, aolu 80&uizw;tn lclyf 2&uizw;dllrz mvy 5 mbyaoly kvzlz (ha dllrz 4, 6, 8, 10 huk 12), aolu thpualuhujl 80&uizw;tn lclyf 4&uizw;dllrz, jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubhapvu vm aylhatlua pm uv ylzwvuzl hmaly 16–20 dllrz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz vm pumljapvu klclsvw kbypun aylhatlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o4>Zlsm-hktpupzayhapvu</o4>     <w>Pm hwwyvwyphal, whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl.</w> \u\u      <w>H Whaplua Slhmsla huk Bzly Thubhs zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Pelrpgbthi pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jvuqbujapcpapz; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; uhbzlh; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl; ulbayvwluph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Huhwofshjapj ylhjapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf (vjjhzpvuhssf shal-vuzla)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
